name: §e§nJungle Habitant
description: You are extremely adapted to living in the Jungle, which comes with many positive and negative effects.

text: You live in the Jungle and living in the Jungle for so long has given you some stealth advantages.
You spawn in a Jungle Biome.
While in a Vanilla Jungle and sneaking on any Vanilla leaves, you will become slightly transparent
It may take a lot longer than usual for you to spawn in a Jungle Biome.
You're experienced at foraging due to living off of melons and berries.
You gain §a+1§r Glow Berry when harvesting Glow Berries.
You gain §a+2§r Sweet Berries when harvesting Sweet Berries.
You gain §a+3§r Melon Slices when harvesting Melons.
Gorillas are capable of eating a variety of foods, however they get the majority of the nutrients needed from a diet consisting of vegetation and fruits.
Meats and foods that contain sugar are §c75%§r less effective.

You have never learned how to swim, therefore you cannot swim.
You ignore water as if it is air and your leap is weaker when used in water.
